characters: A child on the right side of the image, a pedestrian on the left side of the image, a cyclist on the right side of the image, and multiple vehicles on both sides of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image from behind a parked vehicle, directly entering the driving lane. In the second sequence, a pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side of the image from behind a parked vehicle, entering the driving lane. In the third sequence, a cyclist emerges from the right side of the image from behind a parked vehicle, entering the driving lane. All instances create immediate collision risks due to the sudden appearance from behind obstructions.
actions: The child, pedestrian, and cyclist all suddenly emerge from behind parked vehicles, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the image, a child, a pedestrian, a cyclist, and multiple moving vehicles.
